Name: Rescue Lucy 2
About the game: Several years have passed since the girl had found her dog Lucy in the abandoned house. Now the girl has grown up and the player must play for the girl who let her dog Lucy walk around just like she always did. However, the dog does not get back home even several hours afterwards. What might have happened with her? Itâ€™s time to set out on a search of Lucy again and save her! Game features: Awesome graphic design Classic gameplay The tones and the music create mysterious atmosphere, filled with horror Numerous puzzles and mini-games
